metadata.title: Snowflake Boppers Party Accessory (1 count) (1/Pkg)
features: This item is a great value!
description: Beistle 20721 Snowflake Boppers. This is a great headband to wear in the Winter. They are white snowflakes with light blue marabou attached to a white headband. They are one size fits most.

title: Celebrate the Holidays with Beistle - Quality Party Supplies Since 1900!
